summary: Black screen issue likely caused by Claude Code v2.1.27+ rendering bugs, not hook system. Hooks execute quickly (<1s). Recommend testing Claude Code 2.1.25, enabling async hooks, and verifying terminal synchronized output support.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report analyzing Claude Code rendering issues, hook system timing, and Neovim integration with 9 prioritized fix recommendations

next_steps: Run /plan 793 to create implementation plan for fixes
